import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; const Home = () => { const [popularPlans, setPopularPlans] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { // Fetch popular plans fetch('/api/plans') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { // Display just the first 3 plans as "popular" setPopularPlans(data.plans?.slice(0, 3) || []); setLoading(false); }) .catch(err => { console.error('Error fetching plans:', err); setLoading(false); }); }, []); return (

Managing Subscriptions Made Easy

Simplify your digital subscriptions with our all-in-one subscription management platform. Track, manage, and optimize your subscriptions effortlessly.

Why Choose Our Subscription Management?

Renewal Reminders Never miss a renewal date again. Get timely notifications before your subscriptions renew.
Cost Analysis Understand your spending patterns and optimize your subscription costs with detailed analytics.
Centralized Management Manage all your subscriptions in one place. Cancel, renew, and track everything seamlessly.

Popular Subscription Plans

{loading ? (
Loading...
) : popularPlans.length > 0 ? ( popularPlans.map(plan => ( {plan.name} ${plan.price.toFixed(2)} {plan.description} Duration: {plan.duration} days )) ) : (

No plans available right now.

)}
); }; export default Home;
